issue.title: [CI][Crossbow] Remove alpine crossbow jobs
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6432](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6432). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Apparently we don't expect them to pass, so we shouldn't be running them and generating failures that we're supposed to know to ignore.
